column1: {'name': 'idli dhokla recipe | instant dhokla in idli stand | idli khaman', ' Prep Time': '10 minutes', ' Cook Time': '20 minutes', ' Total Time': '30 minutes', ' Servings': '10 idli', ' AUTHOR': 'HEBBARS KITCHEN', ' Course': 'Breakfast', ' Cuisine': 'gujarat', ' Keyword': 'idli dhokla recipe', ' Calories': '160kcal', 'ingredients': ['1½ cup besan / gram flour', '2 tbsp rava / semolina / suji, fine', '½ tsp ginger paste', '1 chilli, finely chopped', '½ tsp turmeric', '1 tsp sugar', 'pinch hing / asafoetida', '¼ cup curd', '2 tbsp oil', '½ tsp salt', '1 cup water', '½ tsp eno fruit salt', '2 tbsp oil', '1 tsp mustard', '½ tsp cumin', '1 tbsp sesame', 'pinch hing / asafoetida', '3 chilli, slit', 'few curry leaves', '¼ cup water', '1 tbsp sugar', '¼ tsp salt', '1 tsp lemon juice', '2 tbsp coconut, grated', '2 tbsp coriander, finely chopped'], 'steps': ['firstly, in a large bowl take 1½ cup besan, 2 tbsp rava,\xa0½ tsp ginger paste and 1 chilli.', 'also add\xa0½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp sugar, pinch hing and ¼ cup curd.', 'now add\xa02 tbsp oil, ½ tsp salt and 1 cup water.', 'whisk and mix well making sure everything is well combined.', 'now add ½ tsp eno fruit salt and mix gently.', 'mix until the mixture turns frothy.', 'now immediately pour the batter into greased idli plate.', 'place the idli plate in steamer and steam for 12 minutes.', 'now prepare the tempering, heat\xa02 tbsp oil.', 'add 1 tsp mustard, ½ tsp cumin, 1 tbsp sesame, pinch hing, 3 chilli and few curry leaves.', 'stir and splutter the tempering.', 'now pour ¼ cup water, 1 tbsp sugar, ¼ tsp salt and 1 tsp lemon juice.', 'mix and boil making sure everything is well combined.', 'pour the tempering over the idli, make sure the water is absorbed by idli.', 'garnish with\xa02 tbsp coconut and\xa02 tbsp coriander.', 'finally, enjoy idli dhokla with green chutney.']}
